summary: 2009  was a common year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
2009  was a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 2009th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 9th year of the 3rd millennium, the 9th year of the 21st century, and the 10th and last year of the 2000s decade.
2009 was designated as:
International Year of Astronomy
International Year of Natural Fibres
International Year of Reconciliation
Year of the Gorilla
